extensionDescription.message: This add-on adds an item to assist translation to the context menu.

notificationTextNotSetup.message: It has been translated into "English" because no initial setup has been done. See the add-on's "Guide page" for details.

optionPageDescribesBasicThing.message: Describes basic things such as initial setup.

optionPageIfSetEn.message: If set to "en - English" , texts and websites will be translated into English.

optionPageLinkToGithub.message: The source code of this add-on is available on Github.

optionPageWhenBingIsSelected.message: When "Bing" is selected, some languages are not available.

optionPageWhenSetWH.message: When set "width:800 and height:720", a size of new window is 800x720. This setting is reflected only when checked.
